name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its soldier-like box body and retro console buttons, it brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its arms and legs are designed with a unique 'hand down' feature, allowing it to interact with various objects with ease. The screen of RetroCat features an adorable cat, providing a charming visual experience. To complete its stylish appearance, it is equipped with trendy shades as an addon.
